subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: After many disappointments, Day, a 27-year-old Australian, captured his first major title, finishing at 20 under par and holding off Jordan Spieth at Whistling Straits.
snippet: After many disappointments, Day, a 27-year-old Australian, captured his first major title, finishing at 20 under par and holding off Jordan Spieth at Whistling Straits.
